title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4062.1 - Walkover in steeplechase, hurdle race
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4062.1 - Walkover in steeplechase, hurdle race

State Regulations

In the event of a walkover in a steeplechase or hurdle
race, it shall be sufficient if the rider of a horse is weighed out and the
horse parades to the starting post. The horse shall then be considered the
winner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

4062.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
